catalog_script_client.name: Validate Date to Return

sys_update_version.name: catalog_script_client_5fe8186783801210e7a6f629feaad366
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>true</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Request Loaner Vehicle">01843450834c5210e7a6f629feaad3fd</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:81dbcdd8838c5210e7a6f629feaad357</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Validate Date to Return</name><order/><published_ref/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
    if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
        return;
    }

    var dateNeeded = g_form.getValue('date_needed');
    var dateToReturn = g_form.getValue('date_to_return');

    if (dateNeeded && dateToReturn) {
        var dateNeededObj = new Date(dateNeeded);
        var dateToReturnObj = new Date(dateToReturn);

        if (dateToReturnObj < dateNeededObj) {
            g_form.showFieldMsg('date_to_return', 'Date to return should not be before the Date needed', 'error');
            g_form.clearValue('date_to_return');
        }
    }
}
]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-08-21 23:27:44</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>5fe8186783801210e7a6f629feaad366</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Validate Date to Return</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Loaner Vehicle Request and Inventory" source="x_1426255_lva">0cb2d84c83081210e7a6f629feaad30b</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Loaner Vehicle Request and Inventory">0cb2d84c83081210e7a6f629feaad30b</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_5fe8186783801210e7a6f629feaad366</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-08-22 00:23:11</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><va_supported>true</va_supported><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
